focus mode strings Setting Start Next Until: Cancel Last: >>Permitted Application Setting<< Permitted Application: ERROR: Can\'t find this application. ERROR: Please set last for at least one minute. Confirm & Continue Hour Minute Hour(s) Minute(s) (null) APP is opening, please wait Please give the permission of floating window. Please give the permission of UsageStats. Provide a way to force exit. If you want exit when the study mode is opened, just touch the time on the screen. While you touching, long click the invisible button where is at the lower-left of the screen, then it will quit. In order to get the wallpaper, please give the \"External Storage Reading\" permission. OK Please let this program using the storage permission.
